title: Chapter 1650 - Cleansed In Blood
body:
Chapter 1650 - Cleansed In Blood

Everyone was astonished.

When Mo Aoyuan attacked, he planned to use his strength as an Immortal King to thoroughly suppress Su Yi. Who could have imagined that a little Universe Realm Immortal like him could control the Laws manifested by the Stele of Heaven’s Will?

“Impossible! Throughout the ages, only those with the Heaven-Guiding Formatic Disc have been able to direct the Laws of this place. How is… How is this possible?” Shen Qingshi looked stricken.

The other Immortal Kings’ hearts clenched, too. Earlier, they took Su Yi for a pawn they could dispose of as they pleased. They didn’t care about him at all. Whether he lived or died was entirely up to them.

But now, they could tell that this didn’t bode well!

Clang!

Su Yi snapped his fingers, and the massive tripod cauldron burst with dazzlingly bright power of the Laws. Shockingly, it ground Mo Aoyuan’s body away, inch by inch. In the end, even his soul was reduced to powder.

An Immortal King had been completely and utterly eradicated with such ease! Everyone’s hair stood on end. They were overcome with fright.

Su Yi’s gaze was distant and cold as he gazed up at Shen Qingshi and the others on the Cloudy Dome Immortal...
